723080.name: Regions of Ruin - Official Sound Track
723080.description:
Regions of Ruin Official Soundtracks.

"This is an Original sound Track, all craftsdwarfship is of the highest quality, it is encrusted with epic melodies and hearty rhythm."

Huge thanks to our sole music (and SFX) Composer, Pau Damia Riera.

Tracks included:

01. Regions of Ruin (Main Theme)
02. Home (Town Biome)
03. Wastelands (Desert Biome)
04. Down Under (Cave Biome)
05. Restore Your Race (Forest Biome)
06. Loneliness (Swamp Biome)
07. Frozen Lands (Snow Biome)
08. Fight For Your People (Boss Fight)
09. To the Bitter End (Big Boss Fight)
10. You Are Dead (Player Death)
11. Fanfare (Victory)
12. Tavern Lute Music
723080.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
